import { useCallback } from 'react' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import AbilityScores from './ability-scores' import { CharacterUI } from '../../../../models/character' import { proficiencyBonus, initiative, sneakAttack, passivePerception, passiveInvestigation, passiveInsight, abilityScoreM, hitBonus, } from '../../../../utils/character' import ArmorClass from '../screen-stats/armor-class' import Speed from '../screen-stats/speed' import StatField from '../common/stat-field' import styles from './styles.module.css' type Props = { character: CharacterUI } const screenVariants = { initial: { x: '100vw' }, animate: { x: '0', transition: { duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeIn' }, }, } const CharacterScreenStats: React.FC = ({ character }) => { const hasSkill = useCallback( (skillName) => { const skill = character.skills.find((skill) => skillName === skill.name) return Boolean(skill) }, [character.skills], ) return (

Attack (Hit)

{character.klass.name === 'Rogue' && ( )}

Senses

 ) } export { CharacterScreenStats as default }
